description: The previous version (in my opinion) made the middle section more difficult to play and generally just made the 19/04/2021 tab more complicated with no added benefit. Thus, this is a resubmission of the 19/04/2021 tab.
title: 21st Century Schizoid Man

description: Corrected some rhythm notation, changed how some things were played in the middle section that should make it a little easier (and is what I imagine how Fripp played it, it makes a lot more sense IMO) and cleaned things up in general
title: 21st Century Schizoid Man

description: Found the missing measures and stuffed them back into place. I couldn't figure out the saxophone bit, so if anyone with any actual talent wants to try their hand, please do :)
title: 21st Century Schizoid Man

description: Changed vocals from guitar to clarinet to avoid confusion between vocals and instruments
